meanings.definition: To arrange excessively or in an excessive manner.
meanings.sent1: She kept overarranging the flowers on the table, trying to make them look perfect.
meanings.sent2: I tend to overarrange my schedule, which sometimes leads to feeling overwhelmed.
meanings.sent3: After overarranging the furniture in the living room, it looked like a maze!
meanings.sent4: Her overarranging of the party decorations turned the room into a colorful wonderland.
meanings.sent5: The chef's overarranging of the ingredients made the dish taste even better than expected.
